imp.core.graphics

Class Quaternion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.graphics.Quaternion
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class Quaternion
extends java.lang.Object
    Quaternions extend a rotation in three dimensions to a rotation in four dimensions. This is to prevent gimbal lock and allow for smooth continuous rotation.
    Version:
    1, 3/16/12
    Author:
    kreierj

      • fromAngles

        public Quaternion fromAngles(float yaw,
                    float roll,
                    float pitch)
        Deprecated. 
        Builds a Quaternion from the rotation angles (y,r,p). These are applied in the order roll, pitch, yaw but are ordered in x,y,z for convenience
        Parameters:
        yaw - Rotation in radians around the y axis
        roll - Rotation in radians around the z axis
        pitch - Rotation in radians around the x axis
        Returns:
        A quaternion which represents the rotation

      • normalize

        public void normalize()
        Deprecated. 
        Normalizes the current quaternion into a unit quaternion

      • mult

        public Vec3 mult(Vec3 v)
        Deprecated. 
        Multiplies this quaternion by a vector. The result is a Vector rotated in space by the quaternion
        Parameters:
        v - The vector to multiply this by
        Returns:
        The result vector
